channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2024010471
item.description:
Report X-2024010471

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-05
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A Fully regulated package came to QA wet and soiled after inspection punctured box caused the spill soiling other contents DescribePack: punctured hole on the box caused the spill DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was brought to QA in a lined tote for inspection

item.title: Report X-2024010443
item.description:
Report X-2024010443

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-19T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-18
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: SHIPMENT WAS NOTICED ON DELIVERY VAN WITH A DAMP SIDE. DRIVER CODED IT DAMAGED, GAVE TO A MANAGER WHO PLACED IN A LINED HAZMAT TOTE, BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE FOR PROCESSING. DescribePack: ONE CAP FAILED, IT WAS NOT TIGHTENED AND RELEASED A SMALL AMOUNT OF LIQUID. CAPS WERE TIGHTENED. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: PLACED IN A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE.

item.title: Report E-2024010254
item.description:
Report E-2024010254

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-18T15:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-19
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported a two-gallon spill of regulated UN1203 "Husqvarna 2-Stroke Pre-Mixed Fuel" that was released at Terminal UDV. (2) one-gallon metal pails were punctured during the loading process impacting Trailer #417-2077. The SDS was reviewed with the terminal who felt comfortable completing the clean-up with terminal-issued PPE. (1) 5-gallon metal drum containing the impacted "Oil Dri" absorbent material, the damaged metal pail(s), the remaining product, and issued PPE was created as waste and left onsite for the terminal to manage.

item.title: Report X-2024010297
item.description:
Report X-2024010297

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-17T15:11:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-23
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs in corrugated carton with corrugated divider. Liquid leaked from under cap of one jug as if contents froze and expanded in transit. Leakage soiled other jugs and damaged carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2024010259
item.description:
Report X-2024010259

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-17T15:11:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-21
  • City: BROOMFIELD
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This hazmat was discovered by a manager during preload who called QA. QA placed hazmat in a plastic bag and red tote and placed it in the fumigator within the hazmat cage. DescribePack: The hazmat has a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat was placed in a plastic bag and red tote.

item.title: Report X-2024010265
item.description:
Report X-2024010265

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-17T15:11:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-21
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damage was discovered in the unload. The unload manager called out for an Admin's assistance in containing the damaged hazmat. DescribePack: The shipment leaked contents through what appears to be a loose closure. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The responding Admin contained the shipment in a hazardous material spill tote and transported the shipment to the hazmat cage for processing.

item.title: Report X-2024010439
item.description:
Report X-2024010439

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-19T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-21
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived to station wet because of internal leakage. Package discovered during unloading and put into plastic bag and tote. DescribePack: Loose lid on and plastic pail. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package discovered during unloading by package handler and informs unload manager. Manager uses gloves to contain leaking package into plastic bag and tote. QA informed about leaking package and searches for SDS. Spillage cleaned properly according SDS. All contaminated contents used for clean up disposed with damaged contents inside salvage drum
